meta.title: About Ghareeb Fencing Solutions | Toledo's Trusted Fence Contractor
meta.description: Family-owned fence company serving Toledo since 2018. Meet Moe Ghareeb and learn why hundreds of homeowners trust us for their fence installation.

hero.headline: About Ghareeb Fencing
hero.description: Family-owned. Locally operated. Committed to quality.

story.headline: Our Story
story.content: Ghareeb Fencing Solutions was founded in 2018 by Moe Ghareeb with a simple mission: provide Toledo-area homeowners with high-quality fence installation at fair prices, backed by exceptional service.
story.content2: What started as a one-man operation has grown into a trusted local business, but our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction remains unchanged. Moe personally oversees every project to ensure it meets our high standards.

items.title: Quality Materials
items.description: We only use premium materials from trusted suppliers - Homeland Vinyl, Ultra Aluminum, and Michigan-sourced cedar.

items.title: Expert Installation
items.description: Our experienced crews follow industry best practices for every installation, ensuring your fence lasts for decades.

items.title: Honest Pricing
items.description: No hidden fees or surprise charges. We provide detailed quotes upfront so you know exactly what to expect.

items.title: Local Commitment
items.description: We live and work in this community. Our reputation depends on your satisfaction.

owner.name: Moe Ghareeb
owner.title: Owner & Lead Installer
owner.bio: Moe has been in the fencing industry for over a decade. His hands-on approach ensures every project receives personal attention and meets the highest quality standards.

cta.headline: Ready to Work With Us?
cta.description: Get a free quote and see why hundreds of Toledo homeowners choose Ghareeb Fencing.
